TEXT.TITLE: OMNICOM GROUP INC <OMCM> 4TH QTR NET
TEXT.BODY:

    Year

16.
    1986 4th qtr and year net includes a charge of 5.9 mln dlrs
and 31.4 mln dlrs, respectively, for corporate restructuring.
